summary: An ordinance relating to the waters within the City of Seattle, providing for the control thereof; prescribing the powers and duties of the Port Warden and other persons in connection therewith; declaring certain things to be nuisances and authorizing the abatement thereof; defining offenses; providing penalties and repealing Ordinance 34379; 34746; 34995; 40555 and 42337, and Sections 52 through 56 of Ordinance 48022, and all other ordinances or parts of ordinances in conflict herewith.
